sentences.english: Judging by the information of a suburb, it does cause some effect of segregation .
sentences.chinese: 從一個城郊鎮的材料看，這種隔離效應是存在的。

sentences.english: Li Jiaqiao village is a typical case of county-suburban villages of the east China.
sentences.chinese: 李家橋村是我國東部城郊農村的典型。

sentences.english: This suburban street is restricted to private residences.
sentences.chinese: 這條城郊街道僅限於私人住宅。

sentences.english: This paper regards the suburb of Yan'an city as its study object.
sentences.chinese: 本文將延安市城郊作爲研究對象。

sentences.english: Huaxi, in the southern outskirts of Guiyang, is the typical suburban agriculture area in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 花溪區地處貴陽市南郊，是貴州典型的城郊農業區。

sentences.english: All the cities together of the children of Aaron the priest, were thirteen, with their suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 亞郎的子孫司祭們共分得了十三座城和所屬城郊。

sentences.english: The towns of the priests, the descendants of Aaron, were thirteen towns in all, with their pasture lands.
sentences.chinese: 亞郎的子孫司祭們共分得了十三座城和所屬城郊。

sentences.english: Thirdly, city develops with the suburb tourism inseparably, promote mutually.
sentences.chinese: 再次，城市發展與城郊旅遊是密不可分，互相促進的。

sentences.english: Taking Liaocheng as an example, the status of the utilization of lowland in city outskirts is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 以聊城市爲例，分析了城郊低窪地區土地利用現狀。

sentences.english: All the cities of the families of Gerson, were thirteen, with their suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 革爾雄人按照家族，共分得了十三座城和所屬城郊。

sentences.english: The frogs in the fields outside the town were croaking cheerfully.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙在城郊的田野裏氣緊地叫着。

sentences.english: In all, ten towns with their pasture lands were given to the families of the clan of Kohath.
sentences.chinese: 刻哈特家族其餘的子孫，共分得了十座城和所屬城郊。

sentences.english: Agro-ecosystem in the suburb is one of the important guarantees of urban ecosystem health.
sentences.chinese: 城郊農田生態系統是城市生態環境的重要保障之一。

sentences.english: The state provided a block of houses for the tomb workers on the outskirts of the city of Amarna.
sentences.chinese: 國家在阿瑪納城郊提供一個街區給打墓工。

sentences.english: In the outskirts are places for horse trekking and golf.
sentences.chinese: 在城郊地區還設有馬上旅行和高爾夫活動場所。

sentences.english: Liulichang Street, the earliest culture is a poor suburb Liao Dynasty Pi village.
sentences.chinese: 琉璃廠文化街最早是遼代城郊的一個窮僻小村。

definition: outer suburbs/remote outskirts of a city
Nancheng county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
